segments.text: Excuse me , did you see a set of keys ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Five keys and a small foot ornament .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a shame ! I didn't see them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , can you help me look for it ? That's my first time here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It's my pleasure . I'd like to help you look for the missing keys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not a big deal.Hey , I found them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , thank God ! I don't know how to thank you , guys .
segments.speaker: S1
